LanguageData.Apparel_CakeHat.label: Cake Hat
LanguageData.Apparel_CakeHat.description: Makes for a very decorative cake top, also great for the Assistants who want to dress to impress.
LanguageData.Apparel_GasMask.label: Gas Mask
